## Just looking at a table

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(readxl)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(ggrepel)


disco_hw <- read_xlsx("table_mean_diffs.xlsx")


```

```{r}


disco_hw

glimpse(disco_hw)



```

```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE,fig.width = 8}



ggplot(disco_hw, mapping = aes(Heart_Rate_Group, Mean_Discontinuity_Score,fill= Heart_Rate_Group))+
  
  geom_point( shape=22, size=7)+
  labs(
    xlab="Trichotomized Heart Rate Groups",
    ylab="Mean Discontinuity Score",
    title = "Mean Discontinuity Score for Three Heart Rate Groups")+
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-0.5, 0.7),
                     breaks = seq(-0.5, 0.7, by=0.05))+
    theme_igray() +
    #lims(y= c(-1,1))+
    #scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 15)+
   theme( axis.line = element_line(colour = "blue", 
                      size = 1, linetype = "solid"))+
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dotdash", color = "blue") +

 geom_label(
    label="Highest 25% Heart Rates", 
    x="high",
    y=0.5,
    label.padding = unit(0.1, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )+
   geom_label(
    label="Middle 50% Heart Rates", 
    x="middle",
    y=-0.3,
    label.padding = unit(0.2, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )+
   geom_label(
    label="Lowest 25% Heart Rates", 
    x="low",
    y=-0.2,
    label.padding = unit(0.2, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )

```





```{r}

scores_and_vitals <- read_xlsx("Discontinuity Measures and Z scores.xlsx")

scores_and_vitals <-  filter(scores_and_vitals,
                    HR != "NA")

scores_and_vitals <-  filter(scores_and_vitals,
                    RSA != "NA")

scores_and_vitals <-  filter(scores_and_vitals,
                    PEP != "NA")

scores_and_vitals <-  filter(scores_and_vitals,
                    SCL != "NA")

scores_and_vitals <-  filter(scores_and_vitals,
                    Aggression_Group != "NA")

glimpse(scores_and_vitals)
view(scores_and_vitals)


```


```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE,fig.width = 8}
drop_na(scores_and_vitals)%>%
ggplot(scores_and_vitals, mapping = aes(HR, Dimensional_Score, fill= Aggression_Groups))+
  
  geom_point(shape=22, size=7)+
  labs(
    xlab="Trichotomized Heart Rate Groups",
    ylab="Mean Discontinuity Score",
    title = "Mean Discontinuity Score for Three Heart Rate Groups")
   
```
